text: Yoann Barbas (born 24 October 1988 in Lavelanet) is a French cyclist riding for . ==Major results== ;2009 : 3rd Overall Ronde de l'Isard : 7th Overall Tour des Pays de Savoie ;2010 : 4th Overall Ronde de l'Isard : 5th Overall Tour des Pays de Savoie ;2011 : 9th Overall Giro della Valle d'Aosta ;2012 : 3rd Overall Tour des Pays de Savoie ;2013 : 1st Overall Tour des Pays de Savoie : 9th Overall Tour Alsace ;2014 : 4th Overall Tour des Pays de Savoie ;2016 : Troféu Joaquim Agostinho ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st 20px Combination classification ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists
title: Yoann Barbas
